generate_job_description.desc: pass all you know about the job requirements, client and interview procedure to generate job description

create_social_media_post.desc: pass job description and generate post for social media

match_resumes.desc: pass job requirements and link to resumes or text of resumes to know which of resumes are more suitable for the job

scan_resume.desc: pass job requirements and link to resumes to know which of candidates are more suitable
